name: teslamate
tagline: A data logger and analytics platform for Tesla vehicles
description: TeslaMate is a self-hosted data logger and visualization platform for Tesla vehicles. It records drives, charges, and states via the Tesla API and exposes dashboards and statistics through Grafana and its own web interface.

features.title: Drive Logging
features.description: Automatically record all drives with route, distance, duration, and energy consumption data

features.title: Charge Tracking
features.description: Monitor charging sessions including location, duration, energy added, and cost calculations

features.title: State Monitoring
features.description: Track vehicle state changes including sleep, idle, driving, and charging with timeline views

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize data through rich Grafana dashboards with customizable charts and metrics

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Analyze driving efficiency, energy consumption, and regenerative braking performance over time

features.title: Cost Tracking
features.description: Calculate charging costs and compare home vs. supercharger expenses for budget management

features.title: Geofencing
features.description: Define locations like home or work to automatically categorize trips and charging sessions

features.title: Battery Degradation
features.description: Track battery health and capacity over time to monitor long-term vehicle condition
